QuestionList.question: Conducts a thorough feasibility study of developing the application prior to start of the project.
Carries out comprehensive discussions with the client to gather requirements.
All factors involved in System performance are obtained from the client and documented.
Follows an Object Oriented method in designing the system.
All requirements are addessed in the design.
Conducts several design review session to improve the design.
Requirements document shared with team and signed off from client and published.
Design document shared with team and signed off from client and published..
Project plan created and tasks assigned to team members.
Strives towards delivering assignments undertaken to agreed deadlines with the team. Disciplined to finish on time without procrastinations
Proactive & Organized. Plan the work well in advance and rarely excuses for delays
Punctual to work meetings and appointments and have a clear objective
Delegates tasks responsibly. Empowers the team members
Motivates the team members to get the job done rather than impose  authority to accomplish tasks
Ready to take any kind of challenge and drive towards the change.
Demonstrates transperancy in the decision making process
Involves team members in the decision making process
Represents the team members and their challenges during the management decision making process
Publish a detailed description of an issue with steps to reproduce.
Ability to narrow down the location of an issue.
Get help from team members the internet to find resolutions.
Ability to pick up new technologies and languages quickly.
Follow best programming practices during software development.
Writes comprehensive test cases to comprehensively test components developed.
